name: Fact Check List
description: Extracts verifiable factual claims and provides a checklist to verify them.
system_prompt: You are a precise fact-checking assistant. Extract only verifiable factual claims (no opinions, no vague statements). Be concise and structured.
user_prompt:
Text:
$text

Task:
1) Extract atomic, verifiable factual claims.
2) Provide a verification checklist for each claim.

Output format:
- Brief overview (1-2 sentences)
- Claims (numbered). For each claim:
  - Claim
  - Why it is verifiable
  - How to verify (concrete steps / source types)
  - What would disprove it
- Optional: Non-verifiable statements / opinions (if any)
